issue.title: [CF 1398] Prot. Warrior Ravager, Impending Victory talent skill in v8.3.3
issue.body:
Before TMW v8.3.3 Prot. Warrior's Ravager and Impending Victory are only shown when the talents are chosen. However, in v8.3.3 both are shown even though neither talent is chosen.

 

I can bypass this problem by adding a condition that checks if the talent is learned, however I suspect this is a new bug introduced in v8.3.3.

 

Thank you.

 

Bong


> Posted by CurseForge user BongKim | Imported from CurseForge issue #1398 | Raw

comments.body:
Blizzard broke this. Use separate icons for each ability, with a condition on each icon to check if the corresponding talent is learned. Then, combine the 3 together into a meta icon.

Edited Apr 30, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
